article.title: Mangum Assigned to Army Training and Doctrine Command

tags.tag: U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command

article.text: Maj. Gen. Kevin W. Mangum, USA, has been nominated for appointment to the rank of lieutenant general and assignment as deputy commanding general/chief of staff, U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command, Joint Base Langley-Eustis, Virginia.Â
